statements: DELETE FROM legal_scholars_research_data WHERE research_topic = 'Privacy Law';
DELETE FROM ResearchData WHERE scholar_id = (SELECT scholar_id FROM LegalScholars WHERE scholar_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM legal_scholars WHERE affiliation = 'University of Oxford'
DELETE FROM research_data WHERE scholar_id = 10 AND data_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM datasets WHERE contributor_id = 123 AND dataset_name LIKE '%research%';
DELETE FROM collaborators WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' OR description IS NULL;
